column4: and can someone suggest me a good laptop for heavy workstation work. ranging from development on Eclipse+Websphere to complex 3D works and rendering .
but the laptop should swing on Ubuntu - HP people are stuffing every laptop with Vista.. god, i want no operating system, and want to save money.
When you buy a HP laptop, don't click EULA license and call HP that you don't agree to the license and want your money back for OS.
really, i didnt know that.. there is hidden agreement
